When it comes to the pioneers of the FPS genre, this game is one of those that I consider the greatest that still holds up to this day. With it's implementation of weapons and aliens into a plot with memorable characters and locations, this game will keep you engaged for hours on end until the very end. A nostalgic relic that deserves its spot in gaming history.
I see why this game is talked about by every serious gaming fanatic

I love the half life series especially this one the story is really enjoyable and really anyone can get hocked into it even if you haven't played half life 1, enemies differ for instance you could be fighting headcrabs to then fight combine or barnacles, I could go on and on about this game however it more fun to experience yourself 
this is a must have pc game worth every cent

Fun game. Good plot. Good graphics. It's got some bugs, but hey, it's almost 2 decades old and it's still running like a dream. And the bugs can be easily fixed for the most part. Honestly I've had a blast playing it. 5 stars.

A classic that still holds up today by both gameplay and graphical standards at a high, at least that is what they say, i play this on a lenovo laptop. Sure i play at minimal settings for most games for fun but it still has never chugged for me so sure. If they receive enough money eventually they might make Half Life 3 so why not? Overall, it can be as graphically demanding as you want it, the game has no cutscenes so speedrun to your hearts content. Also word of warning, do not pick up that can, it will help motivate you to move faster.
Wake up Mr.Freeman, Wake up and smell the ashes.
Başarılı ve 2020 senesinde bile ilgiyi üzerine toplayan bi' yapım. 3 için çok bile geç kaldılar.

Epic addition to the Half-Life franchise. Crazy to see the huge jump in graphics quality from Half-Life 1. 
10/10 would highly recommend.
It's crazy how well this game has aged, it's my first time playing and it's quite immersive!

ПОЖАРНЫЕ, НА РАЙОНЕ КИПИШ, ВСЕ ОТ СМЕХА ПОМИРАЮТ, НА ПОХОРОНАХ ВСЕ РЖУТ, САМ ПРЕЗИДЕНТ ПРИЕХАЛ ВСЯ СТРАНА РЖЕТ АХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХ АХАХАХАХХАХАХАХАХА, У НАРОДА ЖИВОТЫ ЛОПАЮТСЯ ОТ СМЕХА ХАХАХАХАХАХАХАХХ, МЕРТВЫЕ ПРОСЫПАЮТСЯ И ТОЖЕ РЖУТ,
ВСЯ ЗЕМЛЯ РЖЕТ УХАХАХАХАХХАХАХАХХАХАХАХАХХАХАХААХАХАХАХАХаХАхАХАХ, ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ЕЦ, ЗАРЖАЛ ВО ВЕСЬ ГОЛОС, БАТЯ ПРИШЕЛ, ГОВОРИТ XУЛИ ТЫ РЖЁШЬ?! ПОКАЗАЛ ЕМУ, ОН ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ЕЦ ЕЩЕ ГРОМЧЕ МЕНЯ, ДАВАЙ КАТАТЬСЯ ПО ПОЛУ, ДЕД СПУСТИЛСЯ, ГОВОРИТ ЧЕ ЗА ХУЙHЯ?
ПОЧИТАЛ И ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ЕЦ ДАВАЙ РЖАТЬ ТОЖЕ,МАМА ПОЧИТАЛА, ТАК ЗАСМЕЯЛАСЬ, АЖ ДЕДОВЫМ РУЖЬЕМ В СОБАКУ НАЧАЛА СТРЕЛЯТЬ ОТ УГАРА! ПРИБЕЖАЛИ СОСЕДИ, ГОВОРЯТ ЩАС МУCОРОВ ВЫЗОВЕМ, ЧО У ВАС ТАМ ЗА РЖАКА? ПОКАЗАЛИ ИМ, ТЕ HАХУЙ АЖ С ОКОН ПОПАДАЛИ ОТ
ИСТЕРИКИ, МУCОРА ПРИЕХАЛИ, УВИДЕЛИ, Я ИМ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ С ПОРОГА ИГРУ СУЮ, И ОНИ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ С МАКАРОВА НАЧАЛИ ОТ РЖАКИ ♥♥♥♥♥♥РИТЬ, У ДЕДА АЖ ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ ДАВЛЕНИЕ ВСКОЧИЛО,ВРАЧИ ПРИЕХАЛИ, ПОЧИТАЛИ, ДИФЕБРЕЛЯТОРОМ ДРУГ ДРУГА EБАШИТЬ НАЧАЛИ ОТ ХОХМЫ!
Я, БЛЯTЬ, В СКАЙПE ПЕТРОСЯНУ ПОЗВОНИЛ, ТОТ УВИДЕЛ, ТАК ♥♥♥♥♥♥ УГОРАЛ, ЧТО АПЛОДИРУЯ ЛАДОНИ СЕБЕ HАХУЙ ПОЛОМАЛ! ЛOЛ, БЛЯTЬ
from the fights to the puzzles this game never stops being good
Really had fun playing it, It was worth it buying it. :)

Oyun harbi Half-Life 1'in üzerine çok güzel gitmiş ve oyun evrenini o dünyayı tanıtmayı ve ortaya koymayı çok iyi başarmış. Dolu dolu 13 saat ile oyunu bitirdim ve cidden beni oynarken yordu ama oynanış mantığı aşırı güzel ama bazı yerlerde sıkıcılaşa biliyor o da klasik Half-Life yapısı işte ne yapacaksın. Bir de şu gravity gun var ya mükemmel ötesi bir silah harbi oyun dünyasının en iyi silahlarından biri olabilir. Ne deyim indirimde olduğunda kaçırılmaması gereken bir oyun. İlk oyun gibi kötü grafikleri de yok ama ilk oyunun grafiklerine laf atanın olduğunu zannetmediğimden bu grafik konusunu es geçersek Half-Life 2 insanın gözünü falan da yormuyor. Kısaca perfecto...

Bunlardan dolayı oyuna puanım 10 üzerinden 7.
Los mejores juegos de mi niñez, amo half life.
this game is a lot longer than I thought it would be, definitely would recommend this to anyone though.

Half-life 2 très bon jeux

 un gameplay assez dynamique, des mécaniques funs comme le genre de floor is lava avec les fourmis-lion mais mon préfère reste le gravity gun qui est vraiment très marrant quand on s'en sert comme arme,. un bon scénario même si malheureusement ceux n'ayant aucune connaissance du 1 risque de se retrouver perdue et des graphismes par ouf (mais je pense que c'est parce-que le jeu est vieux) sinon les musiques d'actions sont vraiment bien, j'ai étais satisfait du level design qui est très varié et du bestiaire qui offre beaucoup d'ennemie, il n'y a pas mal d'armes pour s'amuser bien quelle sois assez classique(pistolet, fusil a pompe, mitraillette, pieds de biche, etc.)

POINT FORT:
gameplay rapide
Bon scénario
Level design varié
Bestiaires fournis
Musique bien
Pas mal d'armes

POINT FAIBLE:
-temps de chargement entre chaque zone pénible
-Il n'y a pas de récapitulatif du scénario du 1 heureusement que j'ai vu une vidéo qui l’explique car sinon je n'aurais rien compris au scénario qui est pourtant bien
-Graphisme pas beau
-Trop d'armes banales dans un univers comme ça, le seule arme qui change un peu c'est la mitrailleuse a plasma et les spores aliens

CONCLUSION:
Half-life est un bon jeu même s'il n'a pas mal vieilli (sorti né 2004) c'est cool de défoncer des vagues d'ennemies qui arrivent en masse , et si vous installez le "logiciel" synergie sur steam qui permet de jouer en coop a Half-life 2 vous aller vraiment bien vous amuser.
Totalde 7 saatte bitirdim aksaklıklar yaşamasaydım bu 6 saati bulurdu neyse boylelikle 8. oldu

очень крутая игра в свои годы))
This game is the pinnacle of FPS.

English is not my first language so there might be some mistakes here and there                                                     
Very enjoyable even in 2020, the graphics is not too bad and the story is to be consider one of the best I've ever experience. The cast of character is very memorable, each one feel like a real person due to the amazing voice actor, animation and story being told throughout the game.  There will be some minor inconveniences like the aux power which consume when you use the flash light, sprinting, being under water and it consumes quickly when you use multiple ones. But is it not that game breaking and you can still enjoy the game even with the aux power mechanic and the terrible driving control on the boat and the buggy. The game is about 14hr long which isn't actually that long when you play it. Not to mention how the Half-Life series has revolutionize the fps games over the years. Overall, Half-Life 2 gets a 9/10 rating for me
Oyun 18.50 TL ama Ben Yaz İndirimlerinden 3.70 TL'ye Aldım ama Oyuna 40 TL Bile Veririm <3
The earth is 4.6 billion years old and we managed to exist at the same time as this masterpiece.

[h1]Гордон Фримен и его незаменимая монтировка[/h1]
Есть книги на все времена, есть фильмы. Теперь и игры. Одна из таких серия игр Half-life. 
Пишу обзор спустя пять лет после прохождения всех частей. Эта история о невероятном молчуне, Гордоне Фримене, который обладает хладнокровием и проходит все препятствия, несмотря ни на что.
[i]P.S:Монтировка-это сила.[/i] В начале игры сюжет вовсе не понятен. Но со временем ты втягиваешься в эту атмосферу, и у тебя появляются разные версии как и почему так произошло. Чем дальше , тем труднее оторваться от этой игры.
N İ C E    H O C A M

I wouldn't recommend this one either. It goes on for longer than it should.

If you have read my review of Half-Life 1, you know that I played this during the free month where you could play the entire Half-Life franchise for free until Half-Life Alyx launched. So I was in a hurry to finish all 4 games in one month's time, so I resorted to a walkthrough throughout HL-1 and I couldn't come to terms with myself on whether I should follow another walkthrough for Half-Life 2 as well, or just wing it and try to beat the game at my pace.

If you feel that my review is invalid because I used a guide, I understand that, but I'll still keep my rating.

Because I had a limited time for finishing the game, I wanted to finish as many achievements as possible on my first run itself, but I had to decide if I could maintain that on the episodes as well.

But after playing with an achievement walkthrough for 3 chapters, I found out that you can load a chapter at any time after you have completed it, so I didn't have to worry about missing out achievements. At this point, I just stopped focusing on the lambda caches and just tried to do the main objectives of the games properly.

But it still felt like the story just stretched out for no reason and I was constantly left feeling lonely while Alyx and the other characters were doing who knows what.

Another thing I was constantly frustrated about where the antlions. They kept respawning, they kept making that god-awful hissing noise and they just wouldn't leave my side... I wished to burn all of them. This part was like Chapters 9-13 from HL-1 (just terrible)

The best part of the game was no doubt the Citadel. That was not only the best, but the only memorable 3 chapters from the entire game.

Episodes 1 and 2 are much better and shorter versions of this game, where I didn't need to look at a walkthrough even once. I played this game in it's entirety while it was free for that limited time, but I have now purchased HL, HL2, E1 and E2 during the summer 2020 sale.

SPOLIERS...



This game is amazing. It looks great, sounds great, plays great, and feels great. Valve really outdid themselves here. The graphics are amazing, especially facial expressions. Valve did a good job of creating the environments in this game, from run-down City 17 to dark,creepy Ravenholm. Weapons are standard for a FPS (pistol, smg, shotgun, AR, etc.) with a few exceptions. The gravity gun is a wondrous way to show off the games new physics engine, especially during the citadel levels where all you have is an upgraded gravity gun, and the crossbow... The story is deeply intriguing, and will keep you going from the first speech of the g-man through Ravenholm to the epic destruction of the citadel. All I can say is that you need to BUY THIS GAME for the best single-player experience you will ever have. I recommend the orange box because then you get the episodes and the great game Portal. Literally The best PC Game.
polish gordon freeman be like: grzegorz darmowy człowiek

9/10

Always heard the Half-Life series was really good. Now I can see why people say this game is a masterpiece. What a great game!

It's so good, almost as if our baby, our angsty little Half-Life, finally grew up, got a girlfriend, and learned to chill and just have fun. Whereas the first Half-Life felt more tense and experimental (which I actually liked more), Half-Life 2 is the comfortable, self-assured culmination of Valve's game development sorcery that sent shock waves in 2004 and the ripples are still perpetuating to this day. 

TO. THIS. DAY. -waggles fingers- 

[h1]9.5 / 10 [/h1]
